name: AZUR Token
description: At Azur, a remarkable token called AZUR token has been created using the ERC20 standard. This token, bearing the symbol AZUR, was carefully created with the help of OpenZeppelin. By taking advantage of their expertise, we have fortified its trustworthiness and security, ensuring its fitness for future purposes such as: • Designing various games • Native Token in Azur Network • Design and development of various systems and protocols related to AZUR token.
